experience: You and Travis both know David Bradford, Dona Riles, and 13 others

Staffing professional providing full service direct hire and contingent recruiting services in aerospace, semiconductor, manufacturing, medical device and other high technology industries. Source candidates for enterprise-wide positions from administrators to executives in areas including, but not limited to, information technology, operations, engineering, quality, and manufacturing.

Account Executive for IT Consulting and Staffing firm specializing in short and long term contract solutions for Technology and Engineering based companies. Focus on Govnernment based projects and companies with a national presence.

Turbulin combines the power of social networking with call center automation to create the largest most robust virtual call center in the world. To accomplish this we will take advantage of the social networks that already exist. This combination of technologies is called the Global Communication Cloud.

Director of Business Development responsbile for sales and account management, selling company services as a prime contractor or sub-contractor with new and existing accounts. Clients included Government Contracting officers of Federal Agencies and Fortune 500 Federal Prime Contractor companies, i.e, EDS, SAIC, CSC, Northrop Grumman, Booz Allen Hamilton, IBM and BAE Systems. Director of Resource Management responsible for all consulting services sold to Federal and State government agencies, managed consultant development, on-site consultant activities and continuing education and training for all consultants. Responsible for Account Management activities, including sales and marketing of staffing services to all existing and new clients. Managed a staff of up to 5 Resource Managers and responsible for all hiring and training of new staff.

Responsible for the sales of all software and consulting services offered by DMS. Successful in building relationships at top management levels, including CIO, CFO, Vice President of Technology, Director and Manager
